title: Former Volvo CEO on Importance of Blue Collar Workers
itunes:title: Former Volvo CEO on Importance of Blue Collar Workers
description:
Pehr Gyllenhammar, Former CEO of Volvo, discusses the importance of leadership and character amid a global crisis. He says good employees equal good productivity.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Jason Kelly. Producer: Doni Holloway.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
